thread.title: Gary McCord gets the giggles after spotting a monkey in a nappy at Pebble Beach | Golf News | Sky Sports
thread.title_full: Gary McCord gets the giggles after spotting a monkey in a nappy at Pebble Beach | Golf News | Sky Sports

author: Keith Jackson
title: Gary McCord gets the giggles after spotting a monkey in a nappy at Pebble Beach | Golf News | Sky Sports
text:
Gary McCord gets the giggles after spotting a monkey in a nappy at Pebble Beach By Keith Jackson Last Updated: 12/02/17 7:48am CBS commentator Gary McCord suffers a fit of the giggles after the cameras at Pebble Beach spot a man with a nappy-wearing monkey on his shoulders! Veteran golf commentator Gary McCord has provided many laughs for viewers over the years, but he suffered a laughing fit of his own due to an unusual site at Pebble Beach - a monkey wearing a nappy! 
The host broadcaster's cameras were panning around the galleries late on the third day of the AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am when they managed to find a spectator with a monkey perched on his shoulders. 
But as the man turned around, it became clear that the monkey was wearing a nappy - or a diaper in American terminology. Live PGA Tour Golf
